dialogue.name: PARALLELMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Yes, I thought so. Forename Surname, correct? You've been keeping very busy if all the rumors are to be believed.

dialogue.name: PARALLELMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Hmm? Why are you staring at me with such intensity? Pray tell, have I said something to offend you?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: How in the seven hells did you wind up in this world?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You can cross the rift. You of all people...

dialogue.name: PARALLELMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Judging by your cryptic comments I gather I bear a resemblance to someone you know? But I can assure you that we have never met before, you and I.

dialogue.name: PARALLELMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Don't believe me? Then let us be friends. The more you learn about me, the more you will come to realize how different I am from this other “me.”

dialogue.name: PARALLELMINSTREL
dialogue.text: I am a wanderer by trade, but a minstrel at heart. A keeper of tales, a singer of songs, a preserver of forgotten truths. Yet in defiance of my itinerant nature, I have elected to remain here for a time and compose new works.

dialogue.name: PARALLELMINSTREL
dialogue.text: You being a traveling sinner, I'm sure you've seen your share of adventures. Such stories often serve as the best sort of inspiration. Perhaps I could persuade you to regale me with one or two?
